Title: Requires a utilization review of a request for nursing home care after an inpatient hospital admission to be completed within 24 hours of the request
Summary: Requires a utilization review of a request for nursing home care after an inpatient hospital admission to be completed within 24 hours of the request.
LawCode: Amd ยง4903, Pub Health L; amd ยง4903, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to utilization review of coverage of nursing home care following an inpatient hospital admission
